Title: Sex and Violence
Plot: Joey agrees to be Pacey's temporary assistant but their mutual jealousy leads to disaster in the office. Dawson sells his idea for a coming-of-age movie, but when the studio wants to change it to a teen sex film, he must decide whether to stick with his original concept.
GuestStars: Johnny Alonso, Paul Gleason, Sarah Shahi, Nick Gomez, Jill Jackson, Micah Cover, Greg Thompson, Susan Stox, Satu Rautaharju, Brian Rankin, Tymoteusz Dvorak, Sam Tyler, Mehera Blum
